title: 2012 (No. 14 of 2012)) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998) (as adapted
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Education Act 1998 (Unregistered
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Education Act 1998 (Unregistered 

Persons) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited education act 1998 (unregistered persons) (amendment) regulation 2022

title: 2012 (No. 14 of 2012)) of the Education Act 1998 (No. 51 of 1998) (as adapted
heading: 2. Regulation 7 of the Education Act 1998 (Unregistered Persons)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 7 of the Education Act 1998 (Unregistered Persons) 

Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 32 of 2014) is amended – 

(a) 

in paragraph (a), by the deletion of “and”, and 

(b) by the insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph (a): 

“(aa) in the case of a person who satisfies the criteria to be 
eligible to apply to the Teaching Council to be entered on 
the register as a student teacher, pursuant to Route 5 of the 
Schedule 
(Registration) 
the Teaching Council 
Regulations 2016 (S. I. No. 444 of 2016) (amended by the 
Teaching Council (Registration) (Amendment) (No. 2) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 745 of 2021)), for a period or 
periods ending no later than 30 June 2022, and”. 

to 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

15 February, 2022. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 18th February, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [68] 3
